brunch.name: FLORENTINE EGGS BENEDICT
brunch.description: FARM-FRESH POACHED EGGS, BABY SPINACH ON TOASTED ENGLISH MUFFIN, SMOTHERED IN HOLLANDAISE SAUCE SERVED WITH HOME FRIED & FRESH GREENS

brunch.name: SMOKED SALMON EGGS BENEDICT
brunch.description: FARM-FRESH POACHED EGGS, SMOKED SALMON ON TOASTED ENGLISH MUFFIN, SMOTHERED IN HOLLANDAISE SAUCE, SERVED WITH HOME FRIES AND FRESH GREENS

brunch.name: SALMON & AVOCADO BAGEL
brunch.description: SMOKED SALMON SET ON A BED OF SLICED AVOCADO & TOASTED PLAIN BAGEL, GARNISHED WITH WHIPPED RICOTTA & MICRO BASIL, SERVED WITH FRESH GREENS.

brunch.name: BLUEBERRY PANCAKES
brunch.description: HOUSE MADE PANCAKES, LAYERED WITH HONEY & ORANGE LABNEH, TOPPED WITH BLUEBERRY COMPOTE

brunch.name: STEAK FRITES
brunch.description: ADD POACHED EGG +$3. GRILLED 6OZ AAA STRIPLOIN STEAK SERVED WITH TRIPLE COOKED FRITES AND FRESH GREENS

brunch.name: FRITTATA
brunch.description: LEEKS, ROASTED RED PEPPER, BRIE TOPPED WITH BLISTERED CHERRY TOMATOES & MICRO GREENS

brunch.name: BREAKFAST BAGEL SANDWICH
brunch.description: SCRAMBLED EGGS ON A BED OF ARUGULA, SPICY MAYONNAISE & TOASTED BAGEL

brunch.name: LOBBY SALAD
brunch.description: ARUGULA & FRESH HERBS DRESSED IN A CITRUS VINAIGRETTE TOPPED WITH PARMESAN

brunch.name: BOTTOMLESS MIMOSAS
